title: PoC – PLM in Dassault Systèmes
subTitle: This is a subtitle
overviewContent: I participated in a proof of concept (PoC) project for a Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) system at Dassault Systèmes to validate the system's requirements. My role involved collaborating with the team to ensure that the proposed solution met the organisation's needs and objectives, particularly regarding Engineering Orders (EO), Bills of Materials (BOM), and Engineering Orders (EOs). Through this PoC, we aimed to improve turnaround time and feasibility.

skills: Programming Languages : Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, JSP, XML
jd: Developed Engineering Order (EO) pages by customising the Enovia solution.
Assisted in the development of Bills of Materials (BOM) and Engineering Orders (EOs).
Assisted in documenting Requests for Proposal (RFPs), testing scenarios, system documentation, EntityRelationship Diagrams (ERDs), and end-user guides.
Managed system version control using SVN.
